syntaxes.name: Bubble Plot
syntaxes.description: A scatter plot with sized bubbles

syntaxes.name: Treemap
syntaxes.syntax: treemap x(carrier, distance) color(distance) size(#count) label(air_time) tooltip(#all) bin(distance)

syntaxes.name: Tree
syntaxes.syntax: tree x(carrier, distance) size(#count) label(air_time) tooltip(#all) bin(distance)

syntaxes.name: Symbol Plot
syntaxes.syntax: point x(air_time) y(distance) color(carrier) symbol(carrier) tooltip(#all)
syntaxes.description: A scatter plot with sized bubbles

syntaxes.name: Stacked Area
syntaxes.syntax: area x(air_time) y(distance) stack color(carrier) tooltip(#all)
syntaxes.description: Two fields plotted against each other, stacked by a third
